attributes.action: Remove the fee to apply to Masters courses at UK Universities
attributes.background: Applying to study a Masters in the UK costs an average of £60 per course. This fee is non refundable and does not guarantee a place on the course. Therefore, if the application is rejected by the university, the application fee will be retained by the insitution.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the University and not the UK Government or Parliament.
